headline: 'Gutfeld!' on critical race theory, South Carolina protests in Rock Hill

utterances.speaker: JOE BIDEN, PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES

utterances.speaker: PROTESTERS
utterances.sentences: Do your job. Do your job (INAUDIBLE)

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD

Let's make our schools and maybe our military CRT free zones, where students and soldiers can learn the full story of America. There are better ways to establish racial harmony and true equality in this country. And if children are deemed our future, it's time to keep the adults in charge for a bit longer and let the parents take control.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: Let's welcome tonight's guests. This former volleyball star keeps insisting the panel get up and rotate. Fox Nation host Abby Hornacek. Even his thank you notes are bestsellers. And you said something very, very poignant in the greenroom. And I looked at my heart and I said, I don't have any. Mostly because at that point, I had no one to hate, except, you know, there were Lutherans, there were Swedes, and there were Norwegian.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: MIKE BAKER, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER, PORTMAN SQUARE GROUP
utterances.sentences: I am Lutherans.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: Right.

It's a suggestion that even considering yourself above race is white.
